title: Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       To learn more about what's going on in the park, visit the following pages...    News - Find out "What's Happening?" in the park.   History & Culture - Learn the rich history and development of Tuskegee Institute (now Tuskegee University); the contributions of two great men who shared the name, Washington--Drs. Booker T. Washington and George Washington Carver. These giants and others made profound contributions to the fields of Education, Agriculture, Medicine, and Science.   Management - Review Park planning and management documents to see where we came from and where we are going in the ongoing growth and development of Tuskegee Institute National Historic Site.
